title: Accounting close support
description: Ringfence reconciliations, approvals, and close checklists so finance can reduce system dependency without risking reporting integrity.

title: CRM routing and pipeline control
description: Replace brittle assignment rules and manual workarounds with a governed decision layer that clarifies ownership, exceptions, and escalation paths.

title: Project and portfolio management
description: Isolate intake, prioritization, and status control so delivery teams can improve visibility and decision speed without a full platform overhaul.

title: Legal intake and obligation tracking
description: Capture requests once, apply policy-aware triage, and maintain auditable obligation tracking while reducing reliance on heavyweight suites.

title: Operational analytics and executive reporting
description: Decouple decision-grade reporting from platform lock-in by defining shared metrics, reconciliations, and ownership for critical executive views.

title: Procurement approvals and vendor controls
description: Introduce clear approval gates, policy checks, and exception routing to reduce spend leakage while keeping existing systems of record intact.
